infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Sous to take photos of your recipes and scan pantry ingredients
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Sous to access your photo library for recipe images
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Sous to record audio for voice commands while cooking
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized recipe recommendations and measure app performance.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Use Face ID to securely access your Sous account

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Sous to access your photo library for recipe images
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Sous to take photos of your recipes
Allow Sous to scan pantry ingredients and use AR cooking assistant

plugins.faceIDPermission: Use Face ID to securely access your Sous account

plugins._comment: SSL pinning configuration. Primary pin is the current certificate SPKI hash. Backup pin should be the intermediate CA or next certificate's SPKI hash. Update backup pin before certificate rotation. See README for pin rotation procedure.
